subtitle: This creamy porridge is naturally sweet with juicy dried apricots, sultanas and raisins - a delicious and warming start to the day.

method.text: Mix the oats with the milk in a bowl or dish. Stir in the salt and dried fruit.
Cover dish. Cook for 6-8 min on 100% FULL power, stirring well two or three times during this time.
Leave to stand for 4-5 min. Then beat well. Serve hot.

title: Fruity porridge - microwave
